codes.FXDR: Document is a pre-agreed or pre-arranged foreign exchange transaction to which the payment transaction refers.
codes.RADM: Document is a remittance advice sent separately from the current transaction.
codes.RPIN: Document is a linked payment instruction to which the current payment instruction is related, for example, in a cover scenario.
codes.SCOR: Document is a structured communication reference provided by the creditor to identify the referred transaction.

description: Specifies the type of creditor reference as published in an external creditor reference type code set.
name: ExternalCreditorReferenceType1Code
